languages.text: "Твой "расширенный инструментарий", Эмелина — это обычная ересь. Ересь, что приобрела извращенную форму в разуме, слишком долго соприкасавшегося со скверной. Архивраг подточил тебя изнутри. Создать звезду ритуалом Хаоса... ты перешла черту. Теперь уже — окончательно".

"What you call a 'broader range of tools' is heresy, Emelina. Unremarkable, commonplace heresy. Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."
languages.original_text: "Твой "расширенный инструментарий", Эмелина — это обычная ересь. Ересь, что приобрела извращенную форму в разуме, слишком долго соприкасавшегося со скверной. Архивраг подточил тебя изнутри. Создать звезду ритуалом Хаоса... ты перешла черту. Теперь уже — окончательно".

Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."

The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."

languages.text: “你所谓的‘更加广泛的工具’，就是异端邪说，艾米莉娜。这样的异端邪说实在是司空见惯。你长年与腐化接触，心灵也遭到了异端邪说的扭曲。混沌大敌一直都在啃噬你的灵魂。你打算举行混沌仪式，创造一颗恒星……？你的做法已经越过了那条红线。不，简直是把那条红线彻底擦掉了。”
languages.original_text: "What you call a 'broader range of tools' is heresy, Emelina. Unremarkable, commonplace heresy. Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."

traits.locale_text: “你所谓的‘更加广泛的工具’，就是异端邪说，艾米莉娜。这样的异端邪说实在是司空见惯。你长年与腐化接触，心灵也遭到了异端邪说的扭曲。混沌大敌一直都在啃噬你的灵魂。你打算举行混沌仪式，创造一颗恒星……？你的做法已经越过了那条红线。不，简直是把那条红线彻底擦掉了。”

languages.text: «Su "mayor selección de herramientas" incluye la herejía, Emelina. Una herejía corriente, sin nada excepcional. Una herejía que ha adoptado una forma retorcida en una mente sometida al contacto continuado con la corrupción. El Archienemigo te ha estado devorando desde dentro. ¿Crear una estrella con un ritual del Caos?... Ha cruzado la línea. No, la ha arrasado».
languages.original_text: "What you call a 'broader range of tools' is heresy, Emelina. Unremarkable, commonplace heresy. Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."

traits.locale_text: «Su "mayor selección de herramientas" incluye la herejía, Emelina. Una herejía corriente, sin nada excepcional. Una herejía que ha adoptado una forma retorcida en una mente sometida al contacto continuado con la corrupción. El Archienemigo te ha estado devorando desde dentro. ¿Crear una estrella con un ritual del Caos?... Ha cruzado la línea. No, la ha arrasado».

languages.text: 「あなたが『より多彩なツール』と呼ぶものは異端です、エメリナ。目立たない、ありふれた異端。腐敗と長期間接触した心の中で歪んだ形をとった異端。仇敵は内側からあなたを蝕んでいる。混沌の儀式で星を作ると？あなたは一線を越えた。いや、一線を消してしまった」
languages.original_text: "What you call a 'broader range of tools' is heresy, Emelina. Unremarkable, commonplace heresy. Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが『より多彩なツール』と呼ぶものは異端です、エメリナ。目立たない、ありふれた異端。腐敗と長期間接触した心の中で歪んだ形をとった異端。仇敵は内側からあなたを蝕んでいる。混沌の儀式で星を作ると？あなたは一線を越えた。いや、一線を消してしまった」

languages.text: « Votre "palette d'outils" porte un nom, Emelina : l'hérésie. Une hérésie banale et sans grand intérêt qui a pris une forme plus perverse encore dans un esprit longuement exposé à la corruption. Le Grand Ennemi vous consume de l'intérieur. Créer un soleil avec un rituel du Chaos ? Vous avez dépassé les bornes en les piétinant allègrement au passage. »
languages.original_text: "What you call a 'broader range of tools' is heresy, Emelina. Unremarkable, commonplace heresy. Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."

traits.locale_text: « Votre "palette d'outils" porte un nom, Emelina : l'hérésie. Une hérésie banale et sans grand intérêt qui a pris une forme plus perverse encore dans un esprit longuement exposé à la corruption. Le Grand Ennemi vous consume de l'intérieur. Créer un soleil avec un rituel du Chaos ? Vous avez dépassé les bornes en les piétinant allègrement au passage. »

languages.text: "Was Ihr eine 'größere Vielfalt von Werkzeugen' nennt, ist Ketzerei, Emelina. Simple, gewöhnliche Ketzerei. Ketzerei, die eine kranke Form angenommen hat in einem Geist, der zu lange der Verderbnis ausgesetzt war. Der Erzfeind frisst Euch von innen auf. Die Erschaffung eines Sterns durch ein Chaosritual ...? Ihr habt die Grenze überschritten. Nein, Ihr habt die Grenze ausgelöscht."
languages.original_text: "What you call a 'broader range of tools' is heresy, Emelina. Unremarkable, commonplace heresy. Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr eine 'größere Vielfalt von Werkzeugen' nennt, ist Ketzerei, Emelina. Simple, gewöhnliche Ketzerei. Ketzerei, die eine kranke Form angenommen hat in einem Geist, der zu lange der Verderbnis ausgesetzt war. Der Erzfeind frisst Euch von innen auf. Die Erschaffung eines Sterns durch ein Chaosritual ...? Ihr habt die Grenze überschritten. Nein, Ihr habt die Grenze ausgelöscht."

languages.text: "Senin 'daha geniş bir gereç seçkisi' dediğin şey kâfirlik Emelina. Hiçbir öne çıkan tarafı olmayan, alelade bir kâfirlik. Yozlaşmaya uzun süre maruz kalmış bir zihnin içinde çarpık bir biçim almış bir kâfirlik. Şerbaşı seni içten içe yiyip tüketmiş. Bir Kaos ayiniyle yıldız yaratmak mı? Çizgiyi aştın. Hayır, çizgiyi paramparça ettin."
languages.original_text: "What you call a 'broader range of tools' is heresy, Emelina. Unremarkable, commonplace heresy. Heresy that has taken on a twisted form in a mind subjected to prolonged contact with corruption. The Archenemy has been gnawing at you from within. Creating a star with a Chaos ritual...? You have crossed the line. No, you have obliterated the line."
